vulnerabilities.title: Ssrf in Example Corp
vulnerabilities.description: Discovered Server-Side Request Forgery via URL params affecting Example Corp. The application does not properly sanitize user input, allowing an attacker to inject malicious payloads that are executed by the application.
vulnerabilities.impact: An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to make requests to internal systems and potentially access sensitive data.
reproduction_steps: Observe that the payload is executed
vulnerabilities.proof_of_concept:
# Proof of Concept

Payload: http://localhost

This demonstrates Server-Side Request Forgery via URL params

# Validation at 2025-11-08T15:46:40.405640
Validation successful with alternative payload at 2025-11-08T15:46:40.405634
vulnerabilities.remediation: Validate and sanitize all URLs. Implement allowlist of permitted domains. Use network segmentation to limit internal access.
